projects.description: is a platform made to help individuals with dyslexia and/or speech impediments. Using speech recognition technology that tracks you while you read and then training you on sounds that you find difficult. V0.1 was made at the PCHacks Hackathon in 2019 (where it won first place) which supports web and Amazon Alexa. V1.0 is currently under development for web, mobile, Google Home, and Amazon Alexa.

is a revolutionary learning platform that merges convenience for administrators with effective delivery for students. Prepri is perfect for any corporate or NGO setting allowing for quick and effective information transfer, certification training, and/or onboarding. Prepri was created for the TechUnderTwenty Cup where they were connected with current clients.
is a website used for displaying work and getting in contact with potential clients. It hosts all of my newest and coolest projects as well as shows off my abilities.
